description.english: Post a score in any official event!
description.german: Punktzahl im offiziellen Event posten!
description.french: Publiez un score dans un événement officiel !
description.italian: Vai a punti in un evento ufficiale!
description.spanish: ¡Publica 1 puntuación de evento oficial!

description.english: Create your own Tournament.
description.german: Erstelle dein eigenes Turnier.
description.french: Créez votre propre tournoi.
description.italian: Crea il tuo torneo.
description.spanish: Crea tu propio torneo.

description.english: Unlock all reward from a Season!
description.german: Schalte alle Preise aus einer Saison frei!
description.french: Gagnez 1 coupe d'événement Or ou Diamant
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le ricompense di una stagione!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea todas las recompensas de una temporada!

description.english: Earn a Gold or Diamond Event Cup!
description.german: Gold- oder Diamant-Eventpokal erzielen
description.french: Débloquez 1 récompense de plateau !
description.italian: Ottieni una Coppa Oro o Diamante!
description.spanish: ¡Gana una copa de evento oro o diamante!

displayName.french: Le premier, mais pas le dernier

description.english: Unlock 1 table award!
description.german: Schalte 1 Tisch-Preis frei!
description.french: Débloquez 1 récompense de plateau !
description.italian: Sblocca 1 premio del tavolo!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea 1 premio de mesa!

description.english: Score 1,000,000,000 points in total playing your tables.
description.german: Erziele insgesamt 1.000.000.000 Punkte an deinen Tischen.
description.french: Marquez 1 000 000 000 points au total en jouant sur vos plateaux.
description.italian: Ottieni 1.000.000.000 punti in totale sui tuoi tavoli.
description.spanish: Consigue 1 000 000 000 de puntos en total jugando en tus mesas.

description.english: Play all game modes on a table.
description.german: Spiele alle Spielmodi an einem Tisch.
description.french: Jouez à tous les modes de jeu sur un plateau.
description.italian: Gioca tutte le modalità su un tavolo.
description.spanish: Juega a todos los modos de juego de una mesa.

description.english: Unlock your first collectible item!
description.german: Schalte dein erstes Sammelobjekt frei!
description.french: Déverrouillez votre premier objet à collectionner !
description.italian: Sblocca il tuo primo oggetto collezionabile!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea tu primer objeto coleccionable!

description.english: Customize your profile with a Badge, a Frame and a Background.
description.german: Passe dein Profil mit einem Abzeichen, einem Rahmen und einem Hintergrund an.
description.french: Personnalisez votre profil avec un badge, un cadre et un fond.
description.italian: Personalizza il tuo profilo con un distintivo, una cornice e uno sfondo.
description.spanish: Personaliza tu perfil con una placa, un marco y un fondo.

description.english: Play a game on any table.
description.german: Spiele ein Spiel an einem beliebigen Tisch.
description.french: Jouez une partie sur un plateau.
description.italian: Gioca una partita in qualsiasi tavolo.
description.spanish: Juega una partida en cualquier mesa.

description.english: Start building a new starship on the Star Trek™ Pinball: Kelvin Timeline table.
description.german: Starte den Bau ein neues Schiffs am Tisch Star Trek™ Pinball: Kelvin Timeline.
description.french: Commencez à construire un vaisseau sur Star Trek™ Pinball: Kelvin Timeline.
description.italian: Costruisci una nuova nave nel tavolo Star Trek™ Pinball: Kelvin Timeline.
description.spanish: Empieza a construir una nueva nave en Star Trek™ Pinball: Kelvin Timeline.

displayName.french: Et au mépris du danger avancer…

description.english: Reach the wizard mode on the Star Trek™ Pinball: Discovery Table.
description.german: Erreiche den Wizard-Modus am Tisch Star Trek™ Pinball: Discovery.
description.french: Atteignez le mode Wizard sur le plateau Star Trek™ Pinball: Discovery.
description.italian: Raggiungi la modalità wizard nel tavolo Star Trek™ Pinball: Discovery.
description.spanish: Alcanza el modo de mago en la mesa Star Trek™ Pinball: Discovery.

description.english: Successfully defend Cardassia on the Star Trek™ Pinball: Deep Space Nine table.
description.german: Verteidige Cardassia erfolgreich am Tisch Star Trek™ Pinball: Deep Space Nine.
description.french: Protégez Cardassia sur le plateau Star Trek™ Pinball: Deep Space Nine.
description.italian: Difendi Cardassia sul tavolo Star Trek™ Pinball: Deep Space Nine.
description.spanish: Defiende con éxito Cardassia en la mesa Star Trek™ Pinball: Deep Space Nine.

description.english: Start the Wizard mode on Terraforming Mars Pinball.
description.german: Starte den Wizard-Modus von Terraforming Mars Pinball.
description.french: Démarrez le mode Wizard sur Terraforming Mars Pinball.
description.italian: Avvia la modalità Wizard sul tavolo Terraforming Mars Pinball.
description.spanish: Inicia el modo de mago en Terraforming Mars Pinball.

description.english: Defeat the Gloom by completing The Void on the Gloomhaven™ Pinball table.
description.german: Besiege Gloom, indem du Die Leere am Tisch Gloomhaven™ Pinball absolvierst.
description.french: Triomphez du Gloom en complétant le Void sur le plateau Gloomhaven™ Pinball.
description.italian: Sconfiggi l'Oscurità completando Il Vuoto sul tavolo Gloomhaven™ Pinball.
description.spanish: Derrota a la Penumbra completando El Vacío en la mesa Gloomhaven™ Pinball.

description.english: Experience Chaos Catified on the Exploding Kittens Pinball table.
description.german: Erlebe katziges Chaos am Tisch Exploding Kittens Pinball.
description.french: Plongez dans un chaos de chatons sur le plateau Exploding Kittens Pinball.
description.italian: Piomba in un caos miciodiale sul tavolo Exploding Kittens Pinball.
description.spanish: Experimenta el caos gatificado en la mesa Exploding Kittens Pinball.

displayName.german: Habe es für die Mitgift gemacht

description.english: Start the Princess multiball on Epic Quest by hitting the locker wheel 3 times.
description.german: Starte die Prinzessin-Multikugel durch 3-maliges Treffen des Arretierungsrads.
description.french: Débloquer la multibille Princesse en Epic Quest en touchant 3 fois le Bloque-Princesse.
description.italian: Inizia il multiball princ. su Epic Quest colpendo la ruota dell'armadietto 3 volte (Un giocatore).
description.spanish: Inicia multibola princesa en Epic Quest golpeando la rueda de la cámara 3 veces.

description.english: Repel the attack of the robber knights against Camelot on Excalibur!
description.german: Wehre den Angriff der bösen Ritter auf Camelot ab bei Excalibur!
description.french: Repoussez l'attaque des chevaliers félons sur le plateau Excalibur !
description.italian: Respingi l'attacco dei ladri a Camelot sul tavolo Excalibur!
description.spanish: ¡Rechaza el ataque de los caballeros ladrones contra Camelot en Excalibur!

description.english: Start the wizard mode on the A Charlie Brown Christmas™ Pinball table.
description.german: Starte den Wizard-Modus am Tisch A Charlie Brown Christmas™ Pinball.
description.french: Démarrez le mode Wizard sur le plateau A Charlie Brown Christmas™ Pinball.
description.italian: Avvia la modalità wizard nel tavolo A Charlie Brown Christmas™ Pinball.
description.spanish: Inicia el modo de mago en la mesa A Charlie Brown Christmas™ Pinball.

description.english: Convert the ball into the Balanced Chakram on the Xena pinball table!
description.german: Absolviere den Wizard-Modus am Tisch Battlestar Galactica Pinball.
description.french: Terminez le mode Wizard sur le plateau Battlestar Galactica Pinball.
description.italian: Completa la modalità wizard sul tavolo Battlestar Galactica Pinball.
description.spanish: Completa el modo de mago en la mesa Battlestar Galactica Pinball.

description.english: Complete the wizard mode on the Battlestar Galactica Pinball table.
description.german: Verwandle die Kugel in das Ausgeglichene Chakram am Flippertisch Xena!
description.french: Transformez la bille en Chakram équilibré sur le plateau de flipper Xena !
description.italian: Converti la pallina nel Chakram bilanciato sul tavolo Xena!
description.spanish: ¡Convierte la bola en el Chakram equilibrado en la mesa de pinball Xena!

description.english: Complete all missions on the Knight Rider Pinball table.
description.german: Erledige alle Missionen am Tisch Knight Rider Pinball.
description.french: Terminez toutes les missions sur le plateau Knight Rider Pinball.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni del tavolo Knight Rider Pinball.
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones en la mesa Knight Rider Pinball.

description.english: Make 100 Synchronous Shots on the Pacific Rim Pinball table.
description.german: Führe 100 Synchron-Schüsse aus am Tisch Pacific Rim Pinball.
description.french: Effectuez 100 tirs synchrones sur le plateau Pacific Rim Pinball.
description.italian: Esegui 100 colpi Sincronia sul tavolo Pacific Rim Pinball.
description.spanish: Haz 100 disparos de sincronía en la mesa Pacific Rim Pinball.

description.english: Score 10 goals in a single match on the Super League Football table.
description.german: Erziele 10 Tore in einem Spiel am
description.french: Marquez 10 buts en un seul match sur le plateau Super League Football.
description.italian: Segna 10 gol in una sola partita su un tavolo Super League Football.
description.spanish: Marca 10 goles en un solo partido en una mesa de Super League Football.

description.english: Reach player level 5.
description.german: Erreiche Spielerstufe 5.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau de joueur 5.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello giocatore 5.
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel de jugador 5.

description.english: Reach player level 25.
description.german: Erreiche Spielerstufe 25.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau de joueur 25.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello giocatore 25.
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel de jugador 25.

description.english: Reach player level 50.
description.german: Erreiche Spielerstufe 50.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau de joueur 50.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello giocatore 50.
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel de jugador 50.

description.english: Reach player level 75.
description.german: Erreiche Spielerstufe 75.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau de joueur 75.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello giocatore 75.
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel de jugador 75.

description.english: Reach player level 100.
description.german: Erreiche Spielerstufe 100.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau de joueur 100.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello giocatore 100.
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel de jugador 100.

description.english: Complete the Kissing side mode on The Princess Bride Pinball table.
description.german: Absolviere den Küssen-Nebenmodus am Tisch The Princess Bride Pinball.
description.french: Terminez le mode secondaire Baiser sur le plateau The Princess Bride Pinball.
description.italian: Completa la modalità secondaria Bacio sul tavolo The Princess Bride Pinball.
description.spanish: Completa el modo secundario Beso en la mesa The Princess Bride Pinball.

description.english: Perform a Super Skill Shot on the Goat Simulator Pinball table.
description.german: Führe einen Super-Kunstschuss aus am Tisch Goat Simulator Pinball.
description.french: Effectuez un Super Tir de précision sur le plateau Goat Simulator Pinball.
description.italian: Esegui un super tiro d'abilità nel tavolo Goat Simulator Pinball.
description.spanish: Realiza un superdisparo de habilidad en la mesa Goat Simulator Pinball.

description.english: Defeat all riders and get Rank#1 in the motocross race on Banzai Run™.
description.german: Besiege alle Fahrer und erziele Rang 1 im Motocross-Rennen am Tisch Banzai Run™.
description.french: Battez tous les pilotes et obtenez le Rang#1 dans la course sur Banzai Run™.
description.italian: Sconfiggi ogni pilota e ottieni la posizione n. 1 nella gara sul tavolo Banzai Run™.
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los corredores y logra el puesto 1 en la carrera en Banzai Run™.

description.english: Spell BLACK and shoot the Skyway on the Black Knight™ 2000 pinball table.
description.german: Buchstabiere BLACK und triff den Skyway am Flippertisch Black Knight™ 2000.
description.french: Marquez BLACK et touchez la Passerelle sur le plateau Black Knight™ 2000.
description.italian: Componi BLACK e centra lo Skyway sul tavolo da pinball di Black Knight™ 2000.
description.spanish: Deletrea BLACK y dispara al paso elevado en la mesa Black Knight™ 2000.

description.english: Complete the zones and start the multiball on the Earthshaker!™ table!
description.german: Absolviere die Zonen und starte den Multiball am Tisch Earthshaker!™
description.french: Terminez les zones et démarrez la Multibille sur le plateau Earthshaker!™ !
description.italian: Completa le zone e avvia il multiball sul tavolo Earthshaker!™!
description.spanish: ¡Completa las zonas e inicia la multibola en la mesa Earthshaker!™!

description.english: Complete Survivor mode on Tomb Raider Pinball: Adventures of Lara Croft.
description.german: Schaffe den Überlebende-Modus in Tomb Raider Pinball: Adventures of Lara Croft.
description.french: Complétez le mode Survivant sur Tomb Raider Pinball: Adventures of Lara Croft.
description.italian: Completa modalità Superstite in Tomb Raider Pinball: Adventures of Lara Croft.
description.spanish: Termina el modo Superviviente en Tomb Raider Pinball: Adventures of Lara Croft.

description.english: Score a secret skill shot on Tomb Raider Pinball: Secrets of Croft Manor.
description.german: Mach einen geheimen Kunstschuss bei Tomb Raider Pinball: Secrets of Croft Manor
description.french: Marquez un Tir de précision masqué sur Tomb Raider Pinball: Secrets of Croft Manor.
description.italian: Fai un tiro d'abilità segreto in Tomb Raider Pinball: Secrets of Croft Manor.
description.spanish: Haz un disparo de hab. secreto en Tomb Raider Pinball: Secrets of Croft Manor.

description.english: Complete CAB and raise the Jackpot at least 3 times on the Taxi™ table.
description.german: Vervollständige CAB und erhöhe den Jackpot mindestens 3 Mal am Tisch Taxi™.
description.french: Complétez CAB et augmentez le Jackpot au moins 3 fois sur le plateau Taxi™.
description.italian: Completa CAB e aumenta il jackpot almeno 3 volte nel tavolo Taxi™.
description.spanish: Completa CAB y aumenta el premio al menos 3 veces en la mesa Taxi™.

description.english: Solve every case in a single game on the WHO dunnit™ table.
description.german: Löse jeden Fall in einem einzigen Spiel am Tisch WHO dunnit™.
description.french: Résolvez toutes les affaires dans une partie sur le plateau WHO dunnit™.
description.italian: Risolvi ogni caso in una sola partita sul tavolo WHO dunnit™.
description.spanish: Resuelve todos los casos en una sola partida en la mesa WHO dunnit™.

description.english: Lock balls and start Multiball 3 times on the PIN·BOT™ table in a single game.
description.german: Arretiere Kugeln und starte Multiball 3 Mal in einem einzigen Spiel am Tisch PIN·BOT™.
description.french: Bloquez des billes et démarrez 3 fois la Multibille sur le plateau PIN·BOT™ dans une partie.
description.italian: Blocca palline e avvia 3 multiball sul tavolo PIN·BOT™ in una partita.
description.spanish: Bloquea bolas e inicia la multibola 3 veces en la mesa PIN·BOT™ en una sola partida.

description.english: Score a Jackpot during Multi-Ball on the Elvira and the Party Monsters table.
description.german: Kassiere einen Jackpot beim Multiball am Tisch Elvira and the Party Monsters.
description.french: Marquez un Jackpot pendant la Multibille sur Elvira and the Party Monsters.
description.italian: Ottieni un jackpot in un multiball sul tavolo Elvira and the Party Monsters.
description.spanish: Consigue un premio durante la multibola en la mesa Elvira and the Party Monsters.

description.english: Start all six Tales of Terror in a single game on the Scared Stiff table.
description.german: Starte alle sechs Tales of Terror in einem Spiel am Tisch Scared Stiff.
description.french: Démarrez les 6 Tales of Terror au cours d'une même partie sur Scared Stiff.
description.italian: Avvia le sei modalità Tales of Terror in una partita sul tavolo Scared Stiff.
description.spanish: Inicia los seis Tales of Terror en una misma partida en la mesa Scared Stiff.
